item.title: What's New in Shadow DOM v1 (by examples)
item.description:
This document is my attempt to track the difference between Shadow DOM v0 and v1.

This is not a tutorial for Shadow DOM. Rather, this is my attempt to provide a guide for those who are already familiar with Shadow DOM v0 and want to migrate their components to v1 â€¦
item.dc:creator: Hayato Ito (hayato@google.com)
